title: I cannot use my phone speaker on calls, wassup and alarm doesn't work. Music works. Ideas?
content:
Hi support,
Bottom speaker started making funny noises for a few days and then stopped working completely. I can't make phone calls with speaker function, wassup... Alarm doesn't work.  Other functions work, like music apps, YouTube and the sound is clear.
I did try everything, even factory reset....
Could I change somehow those speaker functions to the other speaker so I can avoid going in a repair shop?ðŸ˜£

Thanks
